title: T206 Isbell and Willett for sale or trade
author: bigtrain

posts.post_title: T206 Isbell and Willett for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Two cards I want to move to a new home. Check out the scans, Willett has a little tape on the back. $40 for the pair delivered. Paypal preferred. 
Will listen to trades offers for commons I need. Thanks.
No interest at all? Someone want to make an offer? Hate to go to ebay.
